description:
8 Steps to Creating Your Amazon 'Ghost' Account

Amazon Sellers Account banned from Amazon? Did Amazon ban or suspend your sellers account causing you to lose your stream of income? Having trouble finding a solution to get back into Amazon? Want to get back into Amazon and start your eCommerce business again?

If you answer YES to any of those questions then this course is the right fit for you!

This 8-Step video course will guide and show you how you can create your brand new Amazon Sellers Account and start selling again. Follow the simple step-by-step guaranteed program and you will be able to create a new Amazon sellers account and get back in business and never get suspended or have your selling privileges removed again.

Great support is also provided once you have joined! Should you have any difficulties in any of the steps, just post it in the course discussion box and we will get back to you so you won't feel stuck and helpless in any way.

We have included a 30 day Satisfaction and Money-back Guarantee when you purchase this course.

Good luck and have fun selling on Amazon again! =)

*Updated on May 2016
title: 8 Steps to Creating Your Amazon 'Ghost' Account
